description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/01712/LBC : existing and proposed new windows and doors drawings (3) in respect of works to repair and replace several windows and doors.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Sufficient information has been provided to demonstrate compliance with the requirements of conditions (No. 3). Therefore, it is held that the submission complies with the adopted policies from the London Plan (2021), the Development Management Document (2014), Core Strategy (2010), and the National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF, 2024). Accordingly, the conditions are DISCHARGED.
